thread.title: Special assembly planned at Wits over fee hikes
thread.title_full: Special assembly planned at Wits over fee hikes | News24

author: news24.com
title: Special assembly planned at Wits over fee hikes
text:
Johannesburg - A special assembly is expected to take place at Wits University at noon on Monday to allow its council to report to the university assembly on deliberations surrounding fee increases.
- Are you there or are you affected? Send us your eyewitness accounts and photos .
The university will remain closed on Monday.
This includes the suspension of all lectures, examinations, assessments and practicals, and affects all students and staff on all campuses including the Medical School and affiliated hospitals.
